cleaned_text: Your Custom Text Here Most soaps on the market are derived from detergents filled with harsh chemicals and synthetic lathering ingredients. Although nice fluffy bubbles are great, they affect the environment negatively, as well as dry out your skin. Revitalize in the organic soaps~ Hand made to ensure pure organic ingredients available. Cold pressed to sustain the essential oils added to the process. Your skin (and the planet) will thank you for it.
